Question: MantiSpectra CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MantiSpectra

Product: Nibble™ Spectral Sensing Module

- Nibble™ awarded CES Innovation Award for groundbreaking near-infrared spectral sensing technology
- Patented miniaturized Spectral Sensor, ChipSense™, with advanced AI functionalities
- Fast, cost-effective & non-invasive testing of product properties using real-time near-infrared analysis
- Revolutionizes consumer applications in health, wellness, food monitoring, and environmental control
- Unmatched precision, rapid processing, and versatility
- Empowers real-time insights and actionable data for informed consumer decisions
